Articles.Content:
I was driving an open-cockpit rover on Minmus and rolled (and bounced, and tumbled, and flipped) it, hitting one of the two Kerbals in the external command seat hard enough to trigger the ragdoll mode. However, once I EVA'd the other Kerbal, he popped out of his seat and landed on his feet... as debris. I can't control him at all, and I... kinda need him to be my flight engineer to put together a base.

Anyone know how to fix this issue, or is poor Bob a vegetable?

Edited September 3, 2015 by MaverickSawyer

Yep. You can fix him as described here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75586

I've also created an add-on fix for this if you are interested, which you can link to in my signature.

Cheers,

-Claw
